posts.header: Curious Curios will be returning for sessions on Nov 21st, Nov 28th, and Dec 5th. After the three sessions they will be on break for the rest of the year.

There has been rampant increase of scam artists messaging people from the discord.

Here are some tips to avoid these scam artists:

1. If you get a random message from someone - with a general "Hey how are you?" and you've never interacted with this person (or interacted with them superficially on discords with passing hellos), check their profile.  If they are advertising that they are an artist, or that they have commission slot opens, more than likely they are attempting to scam you into commissions.

2. Do not engage.  These scam artists message a ton of people, and won't go any further if you do not respond, but if they do and you're feeling harassed, message a mod with a screenshot.

Pipe Dreamers is now on Indefinite Hiatus.

 There will be no wrap up session, no fanart session, and pcs from Pipe Dreamers will not appear in future cameos.
